about.title: Vinocolor, une histoire de couleur, de tradition et d'excellence !
about.subtitle: Plongez dans l'histoire de Vinocolor, une marque née de la passion du vin et de l'art de la couleur, où chaque pigment raconte l'histoire d'une nouvelle aventure

item1.title: The Art of Sublimating Barrels
item1.subtitle: NATURAL ORIGIN
item1.description: Vinocolor embodies natural innovation, born of a passion for wine and respect for traditional know-how. This unique powder, made from 80% freeze-dried red wine and 20% grape extract, is designed to enhance the appearance of barrels by masking wine spills.

item2.title: The brand with the distinction in Red
item2.subtitle: PRESERVED ELEGANCE
item2.description: Vinocolor is applied to the central area of the barrels, known as the jable, to preserve their appearance during the various stages of vinification, particularly during topping-up. With Vinocolor, each barrel retains its neat, elegant appearance, in perfect harmony with the art of winemaking.
